name: Ninja Dragon Z10 Color Changing Bluetooth Headphones
description:
The Ninja Dragon Z10 HiFi Stereo Bluetooth Headphones are a versatile and portable audio solution for music enthusiasts and multitaskers. Manufactured by Ninja Dragon, known for its innovative technology and quality audio products, the Z10 merges style with functionality.

Bluetooth 5.0 ensures stable stereo music playback and phone calls across various Bluetooth-enabled devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and computers. For devices without Bluetooth, the built-in 3.5mm audio jack offers a reliable alternative.

The Z10â€™s foldable design and adjustable hinges make it easy to carry. Comfort is prioritized with an ergonomic fit suitable for extended use. The built-in rechargeable battery provides up to 10 hours of music playtime, 2.5 hours of talk time, and up to 20 days of standby on a single USB charge.

Additional features include a TF card slot supporting up to 32GB (TF card not included) and dynamic LED breathing lights with auto-switching in 7 colors. Considering its advanced features, durable build, and affordable price, the Ninja Dragon Z10 offers excellent value for high-quality sound and modern tech conveniences.
